name: Rauriser-Hochalmbahnen
description: The Rauriser - Hochalmbahnen is a ski area on the edge of the Hohe Tauern National Park in Salzburger Land, one hour from Salzburg City. With our varied 32.5 kilometres of pistes up to 2,200 m above sea level, we are suitable for all ability levels. In the ski area we offer a family fun slope, a small family park, a 2.5 km long floodlit toboggan run and a winter hiking trail. We are a modern, certified, Co² neutral cable car company in a traditional, simply genuine valley with 3100 inhabitants and 3200 guest beds.
